metadata.title: CVE-2021-40607 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The schm_box_size function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause a denialof service via a crafted file in the MP4Box command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40607` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac12 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
